long_description: The sweet cross-body Sherpani Lindsay Wallet allows for minimalist travel with compartments for your ID, credit cards, cash and an exterior pocket for the little extras you find along the way. Zippered main compartment has a floral lining. Slots for credit cards; cash and checkbook pockets; clear ID holder. Zippered coin pocket. Sherpani Lindsay Wallet has a narrow string-style shoulder strap.
short_description: The sweet cross-body Sherpani Lindsay Wallet allows for minimalist travel with compartments for your ID, credit cards, cash and an exterior pocket for the little extras you find along the way.
